org.apache.poi.hwpf
Class HWPFDocument

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.poi.POIDocument
      org.apache.poi.hwpf.HWPFDocument

public class HWPFDocument
extends POIDocument

This class acts as the bucket that we throw all of the Word data structures into.

Author:
Ryan Ackley
